person.persName: Luther Thayer Thustin (Louisville US Army Paymaster)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, businessman and soldier. New York native. Married Sallie M. Thustin. Father of Bettie Thustin, Nellie Thustin, Luther Thustin, and Sallie Thustin. Clerk in Louisville in 1860. Major and paymaster for the United States Army in Louisville, Kentucky, from September 11, 1861 to April 30, 1866.
